So I guess something really important that I would like to draw tomar attention eita first of all, eta holo confidentiality er bepare, thik ache. Haan, ei rokom. Haan. Kichhu bishesh oshudhmatre, jekhane ami confidentiality bhenge dite pari. Eta hobe jodi tumi amake bolo je tumi nijeike ar kauke kharap korte paro. Thik ache. Okay. Ar amra bujhte pari je somoye somoye tomar kachhe kichhu asha jawa te pare, eta bujhte chai. Amar kache around 24 ghonta age notice debar jonno pray koro, taate amader onno ekta appointment time set korte pare.

Hmm, bujhte parchi je eti kichu shomoy er jonno thoda theke beshi onkobad and bhoyokari hote pare. Protibar tomar eshe ashar shomoy e. Hmm.
